title: The Freeze-Frame Revolution
description: How do you stage a mutiny when you’re only awake one day in a million?How do you conspire when your tiny handful of potential allies changes with each shift? How do you engage an enemy that never sleeps, that sees through your eyes and hears through your ears, and relentlessly, honestly, only wants what’s best for you?Sunday Ahzmundin is about to find out.
author: Peter Watts
